name: = bosom =
description:
A casual, endless flyer set in space. Try to beat the world record as you grab treasure for points, collect powerups and avoid enemies!

Default controls are:

  1. Arrow keys to fly
  2. Space to teleport

You can remap controls in Options.

Press ESC at any time to pause/unpause the game.

You can collect one weapon powerup and one utility powerup at any one time. Your HUD on the lower left shows the currently equipped powerups.

bosom has an online leaderboard. Set your username in Options and then try to beat the world record and get to the top 5 of the online leaderboard!

Originally started for a ScoreSpace jam, but couldn't finish it on time.

Changelog/Bugs/Missing Features

v0.1 - Initial published version for "open alpha".  I deeply appreciate any comments, bug reports or suggestions!!!  No sound or music yet.
